issues.title: feat(batch): add unified queue schema with freshness fields

summary.key_decisions: Created QueueEntry as a new struct in internal/batch/ rather than modifying the existing seed.Package struct. Used *time.Time for DisambiguatedAt and NextRetryAt to support null JSON values. Validation collects all errors into a single message. Status and confidence values validated against lookup maps with exported constants.

issues.title: feat(batch): bootstrap phase A script for queue migration

summary.key_decisions: Implemented bootstrap logic in internal/batch/bootstrap.go (not cmd/) so it is fully testable. Source extraction covers 10 ecosystem action types plus fallback to version.github_repo. Only 7 of ~274 recipes are skipped (manual installs, source builds). Recipe entries get default priority 3; homebrew queue preserves tier values as priority. Curated overrides get priority 1. Output sorted by priority then name for stable ordering. Output uses UnifiedQueue wrapper with schema_version, updated_at, and entries fields.

issues.title: feat(batch): orchestrator uses queue source directly
ci(batch): recipe merge workflow updates queue status
